org.esupportail.commons.services.exceptionHandling
Interface ExceptionService

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CachingEmailExceptionServiceImpl, EmailExceptionServiceImpl, SafeExceptionServiceImpl, SimpleExceptionServiceImpl
public interface ExceptionService
extends java.io.Serializable

The interface of exception services, used to handle unexpected exceptions.

handleException

void handleException()
                     throws ExceptionHandlingException
Handle an exception. Implementing classes can do anything with the exception, such as loggin it, send a report to an email address, ...

Throws:
ExceptionHandlingException
